rows.label: qst703005_msg0001
rows.name:
Your Highness, everyone,
you have my thanks!

rows.label: qst703005_msg0002
rows.name:
The Gulan special envoy arrived
safely. Now the conference can begin.

rows.label: qst703005_msg0003
rows.name: I am glad to hear it.

rows.label: qst703005_msg0004
rows.name:
There are the Shiyan troops,
and the Grail...

rows.label: qst703005_msg0005
rows.name:
Not to mention the state of affairs
in Superbia and Gula...

rows.label: qst703005_msg0006
rows.name:
Alst seems to be heading for
a period of unrest...

rows.label: qst703005_msg0007
rows.name:
We would like to hear your opinion on
working together to overcome the
hardships facing our two countries.

rows.label: qst703005_msg0008
rows.name: It will be done, Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst703005_msg0010
rows.name:
You can give us your impressions
of the Melosian Honey that was so
difficult to obtain.
